name: Lumophore I (f)
description:
Still taken from a full-dome playback work commissioned for the Kaluga Planetarium and Space Museum, Russia, 2013.

→ The work takes its name from a luminophore - a light-emitting atom or group of atoms. During the film, the audience becomes an integral part of the atomic space.

This render: October 2021

→ Artwork by Paul Prudence @MrPrudence
